mapper.select: SELECT supplier_id, business_account_id, supplier_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active FROM MASTER_SUPPLIER ORDER BY supplier_id

SELECT supplier_id, business_account_id, supplier_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active FROM MASTER_SUPPLIER WHERE business_account_id = #{businessAccountId} ORDER BY supplier_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MASTER_SUPPLIER (business_account_id, supplier_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active) VALUES (#{businessAccountId}, #{supplierName}, #{contactInfo}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{isActive})
